modName: Liliths Decapitator - Custom Battleaxe and Waraxe
summary: This mod is adds a brutal battle axe created by Lilith the vampire empress herself! This mod is part of the \"Lilith\'s tools\" weapon set.
descriptionHtml:
[size=30]This mod has been remade => [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23733]Lilith\'s Obliterator[/url]. I will no longer update / offer support for this file.[/size]







Lilith\'s Decapitator - Custom Battleaxe
----------------------------------------
=========================================================================================
Updates:
-----------

Double edge update for all-in-one
--------------------------------------------

- Adds a double edged axe to the crafting list.

- with and without orb available

All-in-one 1-hander version
---------------------------------------

- All the mesh options (A,B,C) are now added into the game at the same time 

- Stats are the same for all of them

More color options for the handle
----------------------------------------------

- Red and Gray textures for the handle have been added

- For both the 1-hander and the battleaxe


1-handed standalone version
----------------------------------------

- Adds a 1-handed waraxe version of the battleaxe. 
- Mesh options available A,B,C,  orb and no orb (check the pictures)
- Works with the original mod. Stats have been adjusted for a 1-hander.

Optional file - Double edged model
.................................................
- Makes the model double edged (yup it\'s huge)
 
- two variations availaible in the .rar: no orb and with orb

-really small texture glitch is around but it\'s nothing considerable

Updated textures with a new handle.
....................................................
-The handle part of the textures has been completely retextured

-The normal map has been tweaked a little

- More colours coming for the handle later on (like the original red)




=========================================================================================

Description:
- - - - - - - -
Latest version: 1.0

.....................................................................................................................................
This weapon is part of a Weapon set \"Lilith\'s Tools\"
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Lilith\'s Razor - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11908]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Cleavers - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12458]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Disemboweler - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14906]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Decapitator - This Mod

Lilith\'s Reaver - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15969]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Sickle -  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22368]Link[/url]

More weapons coming up including dagger and more! Even maybe an armor set when the stars are aligned!
......................................................................................................................................


This mod is adds a brutal battle axe created by Lilith the vampire empress herself! The base damage of the axe is 30 so it\'s a bit more powerful than 
Daedric Battleaxe but shouldn\'t be too powerful. 

The weapon can be aquired either through daedric crafting (a lot of materials required) or through console (with help lilith -> *gives you the item id* -> player.additem etc.)

The weapon has two (2) different meshes:

orb: This mesh has a \"soul jewel\" with slight glow hovering in the blade

no Orb: Just the same but without the orb. see the screenshots to see the difference.



Note: About the textures

The mod comes with 3 sets of textures that have different resolution:

lowrestextures: Quite bad quality, non-existent loading time 1000x1000

midrestextures: Pretty good quality, moderate loading time 2000x2000

superrestextures: maximal quality, long loading time 4000x4000

Take these choises into account if you\'re changing weapons a lot or your pc\'s hardware is not up to date.

Even if you have a powerful pc the 4k textures still take quite a lot of time to load.

Installion:
- - - - - -

1.  The root folder has two folders: mesh options and texture options. These folders contain the options you can use.

2. Open the mesh options, open either \"orb\" or \"no orb\" folder and put its contents to your data folder.

3. Same thing with textures except the folder has 3 different folders 1k, 2k and 4k. 

4. Now put the .esp file into your data folder, check it in your launcher and you\'re ready to go

*I have not tried installing this mod with the nexus download manager. Manual installation is recommended*

Uninstallion:
- - - - - - - - -

Just remove the files you added.
author: wiikki
